segments.text: what a nice garden ! Look at these tulips !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that would be a good shot . Can you take my picture here , dear ? Please try to get the garden in the frame as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: all right . Would you please stand closer to the flower bed ? Good . Smile . Say " cheese " . OK , got you . That's terrific .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thanks . Could you take one more from this angle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you know how to set the timer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: let me see ... set the timer first and push the button , oh , come here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , but it's blurred and a little dark .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: never mind . Let's go to the falls and try again .
segments.speaker: S1
